objects.specification: A broad rectangular floor plane with a smooth matte surface in a neutral light gray finish. It has a subtle beveled edge and a minimal thickness to create a seamless platform for showcasing the car and allowing visitors to walk freely around the booth. The material has a refined texture that diffuses glare and provides a stable base for all exhibit elements.

A tall solid wall constructed from sturdy panels with a uniform matte surface in a subtle light gray color, forming a clean and modern enclosure. The wall features sharp edges, precise corners, and a sleek finish that reflects minimal light, ensuring a neutral backdrop for display elements. It provides sufficient height and rigidity to define the booth boundary and maintain architectural coherence.

The wall features sharp edges, precise corners, and a sleek finish that reflects minimal light, ensuring a neutral backdrop for display elements. It provides sufficient height and rigidity to define the booth boundary and maintain architectural coherence.

A sleek modern exhibition car with a vibrant high-gloss red paint finish designed to capture attention. It features smooth aerodynamic body panels, polished metallic trim accents, intricately detailed wheel rims, tinted windows, and a reflective surface that highlights the curves and design lines. The model has a realistic scale, balanced proportions, and refined finish suitable for a professional showroom environment.

A contemporary registration desk with a crisp white top and matching red base panels that echo the brand theme. It has smooth rounded corners, subtle integrated branding accents on the front face, and a durable matte finish that is resistant to scratches. The desk is ergonomically designed for visitor interaction, featuring clean lines and a spacious countertop for informational materials and devices.

A compact modern side table with a smooth white round tabletop supported by slender red metal legs. The piece exhibits minimalist form, clean lines, and a sturdy yet lightweight design that complements visitor seating areas. The table has a refined matte finish and balanced proportions, creating a comfortable setting for casual interactions.

A visitor chair featuring a molded shell seat and backrest in crisp white, accented with red cushioned upholstery. The chair rests on slender metal legs finished in matching red, offering a sleek minimalist appearance. It incorporates gentle ergonomic curves for comfort and stability, blending style with functionality in a contemporary design.

It incorporates gentle ergonomic curves for comfort and stability, blending style with functionality in a contemporary design.

A large high-resolution display screen with an ultra-thin black bezel and a glossy surface. It is designed to be wall-mounted with a low-profile bracket and features a crisp vivid color reproduction perfect for dynamic car advertisements and informational content. The screen housing has a clean minimalist design that integrates seamlessly with the booth walls.

The screen housing has a clean minimalist design that integrates seamlessly with the booth walls.

A ceiling-mounted spotlight fixture with a cylindrical off-white metal housing and an adjustable swivel joint. It directs a concentrated beam of bright white light with high color rendering, allowing precise highlighting of the demo car. The fixture has a slim profile and discreet mounting hardware to maintain a clean overhead aesthetic.

A contemporary potted plant featuring lush green foliage arranged in a sleek white cylindrical planter. The leaves are vibrant and full, with natural textures that add a welcoming organic accent to the booth corners. The planter has a smooth matte finish and a balanced proportion suitable for indoor exhibition environments.
